sentences.sContent: At the time, his ideas were ridiculed.
sentences.sCn: 当时他的观点被人讥笑。

sentences.sContent: He had become an object of ridicule among the other teachers.
sentences.sCn: 他成了其他教师嘲笑的对象。

trans.tranOther: to laugh at a person, idea etc and say that they are stupid
unkind laughter or remarks that are intended to make someone or something seem stupid
